name: YellowFeverTestsForYellowFeverVirusAntibodyQuantitative
title: Yellow Fever (Tests for yellow fever virus Antibody [Quantitative])
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Yellow Fever Virus Antibody (Quantitaitve).),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: component: Yellow fever virus antibody (quanttitative)),(Exclusion Criteria: none)
